channel.title: PkOwnage [317]
channel.description:
[center] [IMG]http://i1294.photobucket.com/albums/b618/Daaaaaann2/f0b1d92f-dbe1-4d22-97c7-616474204ece_zpse267e113.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1294.photobucket.com/albums/b618/Daaaaaann2/pkownageguide_zps53bfebcd.png[/img] [SIZE=5] [URL=https://www.dropbox.com/s/wl9uurgnor9b2u4/Play.jar?dl=1]Play[/URL][/SIZE]
PkOwnage is a Server that has recently returned again from the old one that was running around 10 Months ago, We shut down for a while whilst keeping the forums and site running and now we're back with the release of a new OSRS Based server! You could almost say this is PkOwnage v5 or something haha, since I also ran a server named PkOwnage back in 2008 which never even achieved a VPS but still managed 15+ Online not bad for a Project Czar eh! Well, I'm certainly still around and you can join me on the new PkOwnage Adventure!
PkOwnage is based around PKing but we also have a fairly strong economy; meaning that when you do PK you generally will achieve some wealth if you were to Smite someone and they had some sort of risk! We may have a fairly strong economy meaning you will need to work your way up from the bottom when you begin but we also do offer quick spawning sets so you would be able to gear up quicker for quicker combat with friends and foes! See more of this in the media
Enough about PKing, I'm sure you're all well aware of how to! PkOwnage not only offers PKing but also a variety of Minigames, Bosses and challenges along the way! We're always looking for new additions to the server so that everyone has a great time when playing. A recent addition to the server was Revenants and we saw a huge increase of PK activity deeper in the wilderness; Which you're unable to teleport in unless you're in 20 or under wilderness!
We have so much more to add to the server still and it'd be great to hear your suggestions as to what you like and dislike; feedback is always welcome on our current forums! We do hope to move to a full professional website with web-host soon!
[url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/watch?v=_cVSXytkVUc&list=UUfQBqhCQS9dgMzOqLzMo4FQ]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_cVSXytkVUc&list=UUfQBqhCQS9dgMzOqLzMo4FQ[/url]
[b][u][SIZE=4]PkOwnage Features[/SIZE][/u][/b]
[b]24/7 VPS, DDoS Protected[/b] Rimmington Home, Wilderness close by! Along with a Wilderness exit Safe timer Easy access to Edgeville & Other loveable Pk areas around the map! Player killing System - 75k GP drop a kill, 1-6 Pk Points and 100-250 Dungeoneering point Tokens! Reasonable Economy making PKing that little bit more exciting when you get the rare loot you always wanted! Shops to be found around the home area and other areas such as Skilling, TzHaar and at the Mage Bank New items from the OSRS Game available here, we plan to add more! Many Mini-games such as Pest control, Duelling Arena, Fight pits, Fight caves, Barrows and more! Duelling wins & losses counter, show off them hard earned stakes! Donator status' & Dicing is Available in-game! With Dice Host ranks and rolls that feed into the Clan Chat Fun 'unique' Easy & Medium Clues, and 'Hard' Map clues with rewards & a clue completion counter! Lots of areas to go to, mainly accessed via the Magic Spell book Teleports 10+ Bosses to defeat from Revenants to the Barrelchest, GWD Bosses, Sea Troll Queen, KBD, Giant Mole, Chaos Elemental Wilderness Revenant caves, will you Survive with your marvellous lootations?! Wilderness GWD Bosses & a Boss killing system, again earn points and cash out! Not all bosses are located in the wilderness! There are plenty to choose from outside it Many untradeable items to improve your account for PVP to earn Various other point systems from Mage Arena Points to Barrows Points! All Working skills to become a Max Cape Completionist! ::commands - This will tell you every command that you as a player will need to know! xplock/unlock NPC So pures can keep their stats, or if someone simply wanted to lock XP. Friendly Owner, I will help you as best I can when I can when I'm not sleeping or busy!
[b][i]The Media will tell you a lot more about the server just from taking a look! I hope you do choose to visit us :)[/i][/b]
[SIZE=3][u][b]PkOwnage Starter[/b][/u][/SIZE] [IMG]http://i1294.photobucket.com/albums/b618/Daaaaaann2/startser_zps0acfdf2a.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/16gyhq0.png[/img]
[spoiler=Home area, skill, commands, teleports and shops] [IMG]http://i1294.photobucket.com/albums/b618/Daaaaaann2/homebankpkpshopdungothershophomeareaspureshop_zps831dc340.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1294.photobucket.com/albums/b618/Daaaaaann2/skillingislandcmdsallspellbookteles_zps600998f9.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1294.photobucket.com/albums/b618/Daaaaaann2/shopsinprogressmorehomeshops_zpsed8382cd.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1294.photobucket.com/albums/b618/Daaaaaann2/pointshops_zps41f3f3b8.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1294.photobucket.com/albums/b618/Daaaaaann2/expensivebridsetmultihomewildquesttabfull_zpsbc8e2bc3.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[spoiler=Bosses, Minigames and Clan Chat] [IMG]http://i1294.photobucket.com/albums/b618/Daaaaaann2/seatrollrev_zps64fbc6fc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1294.photobucket.com/albums/b618/Daaaaaann2/gwd_zps5c30b100.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1294.photobucket.com/albums/b618/Daaaaaann2/ggfightpitsduelbarpest_zpsc4a07763.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1294.photobucket.com/albums/b618/Daaaaaann2/cc_zps9f7d5d91.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1294.photobucket.com/albums/b618/Daaaaaann2/dicingls_zpsc08f2113.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[IMG]http://i1294.photobucket.com/albums/b618/Daaaaaann2/pkobanner_zps325a1b00.gif[/img] [/center]

item.title: PkOwnage [317]
item.dc:creator: @newscape2016 newscape2016
item.description:
@newscape2016 wrote:

[center]

f0b1d92f-dbe1-4d22-97c7-616474204ece_zpse267e113.png1024×151


[SIZE=5]
Play[/SIZE]

PkOwnage is a Server that has recently returned again from the old one that was running around 10 Months ago, We shut down for a while whilst keeping the forums and site running and now we’re back with the release of a new OSRS Based server! You could almost say this is PkOwnage v5 or something haha, since I also ran a server named PkOwnage back in 2008 which never even achieved a VPS but still managed 15+ Online not bad for a Project Czar eh! Well, I’m certainly still around and you can join me on the new PkOwnage Adventure!

PkOwnage is based around PKing but we also have a fairly strong economy; meaning that when you do PK you generally will achieve some wealth if you were to Smite someone and they had some sort of risk! We may have a fairly strong economy meaning you will need to work your way up from the bottom when you begin but we also do offer quick spawning sets so you would be able to gear up quicker for quicker combat with friends and foes! See more of this in the media

Enough about PKing, I’m sure you’re all well aware of how to! PkOwnage not only offers PKing but also a variety of Minigames, Bosses and challenges along the way! We’re always looking for new additions to the server so that everyone has a great time when playing. A recent addition to the server was Revenants and we saw a huge increase of PK activity deeper in the wilderness; Which you’re unable to teleport in unless you’re in 20 or under wilderness!

We have so much more to add to the server still and it’d be great to hear your suggestions as to what you like and dislike; feedback is always welcome on our current forums! We do hope to move to a full professional website with web-host soon!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_cVSXytkVUc&list=UUfQBqhCQS9dgMzOqLzMo4FQ

[SIZE=4]PkOwnage Features[/SIZE]

24/7 VPS, DDoS Protected
Rimmington Home, Wilderness close by! Along with a Wilderness exit Safe timer
Easy access to Edgeville & Other loveable Pk areas around the map!
Player killing System - 75k GP drop a kill, 1-6 Pk Points and 100-250 Dungeoneering point Tokens!
Reasonable Economy making PKing that little bit more exciting when you get the rare loot you always wanted!
Shops to be found around the home area and other areas such as Skilling, TzHaar and at the Mage Bank
New items from the OSRS Game available here, we plan to add more!
Many Mini-games such as Pest control, Duelling Arena, Fight pits, Fight caves, Barrows and more!
Duelling wins & losses counter, show off them hard earned stakes!
Donator status’ & Dicing is Available in-game! With Dice Host ranks and rolls that feed into the Clan Chat
Fun ‘unique’ Easy & Medium Clues, and ‘Hard’ Map clues with rewards & a clue completion counter!
Lots of areas to go to, mainly accessed via the Magic Spell book Teleports
10+ Bosses to defeat from Revenants to the Barrelchest, GWD Bosses, Sea Troll Queen, KBD, Giant Mole, Chaos Elemental
Wilderness Revenant caves, will you Survive with your marvellous lootations?!
Wilderness GWD Bosses & a Boss killing system, again earn points and cash out!
Not all bosses are located in the wilderness! There are plenty to choose from outside it
Many untradeable items to improve your account for PVP to earn
Various other point systems from Mage Arena Points to Barrows Points!
All Working skills to become a Max Cape Completionist!
::commands - This will tell you every command that you as a player will need to know!
xplock/unlock NPC So pures can keep their stats, or if someone simply wanted to lock XP.
Friendly Owner, I will help you as best I can when I can when I’m not sleeping or busy!

The Media will tell you a lot more about the server just from taking a look! I hope you do choose to visit us

[SIZE=3]PkOwnage Starter[/SIZE]
